column3: I tested by doing initial block downloads on Bitcoin and testnet.  Also tested on bitcoin with each of the hashes broken to make sure it rejected the violators.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ab91bf39b7c11e9c86bb2043c24f0f377f1cf514 for binaries and test log.\n
What happend to that 2 blocks, which forces you to special-case them? Perhaps an easy answer is possible ;).\n

@Diapolo The miner used an identical pubkey and extranonce, resulting in a duplicate coinbase transaction. (which replaced the prior one, making the earlier one effectively unspendable). This has happened twice... an expensive mistake.\n

Great idea, it minimizes the window in which exceptions to the rules are possible.

ACK
